1.0-004

admin
1234
AR-5302

===Stimulating port 5555 (from Internet)=== 
$ nc xx.xx.xx.xx 5555
get

HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed
Allow: GET, HEAD, POST, PUT
Content-Length: 0
Server: RomPager/4.07 UPnP/1.0
See [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universal_Plug_and_Play#Access_from_the_Internet Wikipedia: Universal_Plug_and_Play Access_from_the_Internet]
and [http://seclists.org/fulldisclosure/2010/Dec/113 Full Disclosure: RomPager/4.07 UPnP/1.0. Issue: A reboot can be caused when a special crafted http request is sent] ===Processes===
